video_description:
The Kogan Agora 7" Tablet is the most affordable tablet in the world. Enjoy the power of Android on a fast, portable tablet without breaking the bank!

Guilt free entertainment at under $200 / £125:

http://www.kogan.com/au/shop/tablets-laptops/
http://www.kogan.co.uk/shop/7-inch-tablet-pc-android/
title: See the Kogan Agora 7" Tablet powered by Android - Guilt Free Entertainment

comments.text: isnt thisthe same add u uploaded the﻿ other day??
comments.author: AridersLife

comments.text: Bad reviews and no contact with UK buyers about shipping date which﻿ is now overdue !  Bad start.
comments.author: compo29

comments.text: We have provided feedback to all customers through Facebook and Twitter very promptly, and are updating customers with emails. There have been slight delays with one of the shipments which were out of our control,﻿ but the team is working hard to get these to customers as quickly as possible!
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text:
Just received my tablet and bottom corner of screen doesn't work ie back button go l m k﻿ p and o keys when the keyboard is up.  Now waiting on customer support. 

Worth the wait then.
comments.author: compo29

comments.text: Nice - but will it go on sale in﻿ the USA?
comments.author: Haljordan100

comments.text: you can tell﻿ the build quality is rubbish
comments.author: psalib89

comments.text: then go pay 3 times more for﻿ ipad
comments.author: BiggerThinking1

comments.text: I﻿ received my replacement a couple of days ago and must say I am quite impressed now I have a fully functional unit.  Plays itv player and 3d games well :)
comments.author: compo29

comments.text: what﻿ song is used ?
comments.author: Jrome15Fifteen

comments.text: Just ordered one, can't wait to get it.. something to entertain me﻿ whilst on a flight. : )
comments.author: davi3zz

comments.text: Enjoy! You'll love it. Make sure you load up some games before the flight,﻿ and safe travels!
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text: Glad to hear﻿ you're enjoying it :-)
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text: how many apps, in the app store? : )﻿
comments.author: davi3zz

comments.text: Was looking at getting this device or an Archos 70, does﻿ anyone have any feedback on which one is better? Mainly want it for some flash videa, and the playback of movies through HDMI to my living room TV. Also how is the Android operating system on th Kogan, as I heard rumours the early ones were a bit buggy?
comments.author: SouthEastBlue

comments.text: might buy 2 of these next tuesday i assume they can get﻿ to southampton from kogan.co.uk in time for christmas?
comments.author: zandorius

comments.text: Absolutely! Your order will usually arrive within 2 days﻿ of ordering
comments.author: vukikuv

comments.text: cheers for the reply, good to know :)﻿
comments.author: zandorius

comments.text: Im﻿ getting this tablet but what is the song because i like it???
comments.author: Toushiro5127

comments.text: Can﻿ you update to ICS?
comments.author: David Dubow

comments.text: These are are special today only﻿ for $99AUD , use discount code FBTABLET
comments.author: Hotzone1975

comments.text:
Email arrived - not clear specs.  My eBay 7inch tablet had usb via a rare add-on gadget.  3.5mm audio socket - Kogan specs do not mention this.

Had poor purchase with Kogan:  2 DEAD PIXELS is ok, even if bright dazzling light spots in the centre of the screen.  It was the third LED TV that I had bought﻿ from Kogan, Melbourne.  They don't care about costumer loyalty, nor bad press publicity.
comments.author: Greg Zeng

comments.text: So that you can't hear the tablet making zero or poor quality﻿ noise.
comments.author: Greg Zeng

comments.text: Just ordered the new Kogan Agora ICS 10" 8GB Tablet for $198 including shipping... Cannot wait to try it out! My first Kogan product, I hope﻿ it works well!
comments.author: jdt3000

comments.text: Honestly how well would the 10" version play movies, that's all I want it﻿ for, browsing the web and watching the movies on regular long train journeys I take. Will it be smooth playback? Any Ghosting?
comments.author: mentalsheep85

comments.text: It will play videos fine without ghosting. Your long train journeys﻿ should become a little less boring :)
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text: Given all i do is watch 720p movies, what would the battery life be on the﻿ 10" model?
comments.author: Zakarye Dib

comments.text: With constant movie watching you should get 4-5 hours of battery﻿ life
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text: That's pretty good, can I﻿ ask how long the charging time is?
comments.author: Zakarye Dib

comments.text: Hi Zakarye, it charges fully in about 4-5 hours﻿ too!
comments.author: KoganVideo

comments.text:
Does it play any "good graphics" 3D games?
Im﻿ really thinking about purchasing one
comments.author: Zakarye Dib

comments.text: Yep - just check out the Google Play store and you'll﻿ see plenty of fun games there with great graphics!
comments.author: KoganVideo
